custom_edit.description:
Create a fully customizable video edit using Shotstack's timeline structure. ## Timeline Structure A timeline contains tracks (layers). Tracks at index 0 are on top (foreground). - timeline.tracks: array of Track objects - timeline.background: hex color (e.g., '#000000') - timeline.soundtrack: optional audio track ## Tracks and Clips Each track contains clips placed at specific times: - clip.asset: the media asset (video, image, title, audio, html) - clip.start: when the clip starts (seconds from timeline start) - clip.length: how long the clip plays (seconds) - clip.fit: how to fit the asset ('crop', 'cover', 'contain', 'none') - clip.scale: scale factor (1 = 100%) - clip.position: position preset ('center', 'top', 'topRight', 'right', 'bottomRight', 'bottom', 'bottomLeft', 'left', 'topLeft') - clip.offset: {x, y} offset from position (-1 to 1, relative to frame) - clip.transition: {in: 'fade', out: 'fade'} - see transitions below - clip.effect: motion effect ('zoomIn', 'zoomOut', 'slideLeft', etc.) - clip.filter: visual filter ('greyscale') - clip.opacity: 0 to 1 ## Asset Types ### VideoAsset {type: 'video', src: 'https://...', trim: 5, volume: 0.8} - src: video URL - trim: start playback from this point (seconds) - volume: 0 to 1 ### ImageAsset {type: 'image', src: 'https://...'} - src: image URL ### TitleAsset (Text) {type: 'title', text: 'Hello World', style: 'minimal', color: '#ffffff', size: 'medium', position: 'center'} - text: the text to display - style: 'minimal', 'blockbuster', 'vogue', 'sketch', 'chunk', 'marker', 'future', 'subtitle' - color: hex color - size: 'xx-small', 'x-small', 'small', 'medium', 'large', 'x-large', 'xx-large' - position: 'top', 'topRight', 'right', 'bottomRight', 'bottom', 'bottomLeft', 'left', 'topLeft', 'center' - background: hex color for text background ### AudioAsset {type: 'audio', src: 'https://...', trim: 0, volume: 1, effect: 'fadeIn'} - src: audio URL - trim: start from this point - volume: 0 to 1 - effect: 'fadeIn', 'fadeOut', 'fadeInFadeOut' ### HtmlAsset {type: 'html', html: '

HTML content

', css: 'p { color: white; }', width: 400, height: 300} ## Transitions (for clip.transition.in or .out) - fade, fadeSlow, fadeFast - fadeBlack, fadeWhite - wipeLeft, wipeRight (+ Slow/Fast variants) - slideLeft, slideRight, slideUp, slideDown (+ Slow/Fast) - carouselLeft, carouselRight, carouselUp, carouselDown - zoom, reveal ## Motion Effects (for clip.effect) - zoomIn, zoomOut (+ Slow/Fast) - slideLeft, slideRight, slideUp, slideDown (+ Slow/Fast) ## Output Configuration - format: 'mp4', 'gif', 'mp3', 'jpg', 'png' - resolution: 'preview', 'mobile', 'sd', 'hd', '1080', '4k' - aspectRatio: '16:9', '9:16', '1:1', '4:5', '4:3' - fps: 12-60 - quality: 'low', 'medium', 'high' - poster: {capture: 1} - capture frame at 1 second as thumbnail ## Example: Video with text overlay { timeline: { tracks: [ {clips: [{asset: {type: 'title', text: 'My Title', style: 'blockbuster'}, start: 0, length: 5}]}, {clips: [{asset: {type: 'video', src: 'https://example.com/video.mp4'}, start: 0, length: 10}]} ] }, output: {format: 'mp4', resolution: 'hd'} }

add_captions.description:
Add auto-generated or manual captions/subtitles to a video with customizable styling. Supports automatic speech-to-text transcription or manual SRT/VTT subtitle files. Captions are burned into the video.

## Caption Source
- **Auto-generate**: Set auto_generate=true to automatically transcribe audio from the video using AI speech recognition
- **Manual**: Provide a subtitle_url pointing to an SRT or VTT file

## Font Styling
- font_family: Font name (e.g., 'Open Sans', 'Roboto', 'Arial')
- font_size: Size in pixels (default: 16)
- font_color: Hex color (default: '#ffffff')
- line_height: Line spacing multiplier
- stroke_color: Text outline color (e.g., '#000000' for black outline)
- stroke_width: Outline thickness in pixels

## Background Styling
- background_color: Background color behind text (e.g., '#000000')
- background_opacity: 0-1 transparency (default: 0.8)
- background_padding: Padding in pixels (default: 10)
- background_border_radius: Rounded corners (default: 4)

## Position
- position: 'top', 'bottom', or 'center' (default: 'bottom')
- margin_top/bottom/left/right: Fine-tune position (0-1 relative to frame)
- width/height: Caption box dimensions

video_url.description: URL of the video to add captions to

subtitle_url.description: URL to SRT or VTT subtitle file (if not auto-generating)

background_color.description: Background color behind caption text as hex
